name: sb-xero-attach-master-actor
title: SB Xero Attach Master Actor
description: Takes a single JSON string with Year and Links, downloads 3+ Dropbox CSVs, merges and classifies them into a master attachment map.

json.title: Year+Links payload (JSON string)
json.description: Exactly the string produced by Make, e.g. {"Year":"2016","Links":"{\"TempLink\":\"https://...\"}, {\"TempLink\":\"https://...\"}, {\"TempLink\":\"https://...\"}"}
